title: I'm trying to make a new league account
body: Trying to make a new league account but when it asks me for my email i put it in then accept and it does nothing so i don't know what to do please help somebaody

replies.body:
One email can hold more than one league account, but I'd just double check you:

- Input all your details properly
- Make sure that something else isn't the reason it cant start, ie: Account name taken.
- Refresh the page. Sometimes closing down your web browser and starting it back up again helps.

If all else fails, post a ticket into Riot Support for a hand.
